sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A treatise of ruling elders and deacons In which, these things which belong to the understanding of their office and duty, are clearly and shortly set down. By a Minister of the Church of Scotland. Guthrie, James, 1612?-1661.
92 p.
re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to their most excellent Majesties, Edinburgh : anno Dom. 1690.
A minister of the Church of Scotland = James Guthrie. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
